ASE-BOOSE-DOC
Table of Contents

Namespace Booseapptest

Classes

AppArrayTests

Unit tests for array-related commands/behaviour in the BOOSE application layer: verifies correct poke/peek operations for int and real arrays, and validates out-of-bounds access throws the expected exception.

AppBooleanTests

Unit tests for the AppBoolean command/variable handling: verifies boolean variables are created on compile, valid values are set correctly, and invalid boolean assignments are rejected with the expected exception.

AppForTests

Unit tests for the AppFor command: verifies initial execution sets the loop variable correctly and that subsequent iterations increment the loop variable as expected.

AppIfTests

Unit tests for the AppIf command: verifies that when the IF condition evaluates to true, execution does not jump to the end of the IF block and the condition state is set correctly.

AppIntTests

Unit tests for the AppInt command/variable handling: verifies integer variables are created on compile, valid integer values (including negatives) are set correctly, and non-integer values are rejected with the expected exception.

AppMethodTests

Unit tests for BOOSE method support (definition/parsing/compilation): verifies that a method definition compiles successfully, creates the expected return and parameter variables, and (optionally) that the method is registered within the program/method registry.

AppRealTests

Unit tests for the AppReal command/variable handling: verifies real variables are created on compile, numeric values are stored correctly (including integers assigned to reals), and non-numeric assignments are rejected.

AppWhileTests

Unit tests for the AppWhile command: verifies that when the WHILE condition evaluates to true, execution does not jump to the end of the loop and the condition state is set correctly.

Test1

Contains unit tests for verifying the functionality of the AppCanvas class, including MoveTo, DrawTo, and multi-line program behavior.

Made with docfx
